data.name: Lootun
data.detailed_description:
Lootun is a semi-idle game that allows you to create teams of up to 3 and send them off to clear dungeons for you while you equip, salvage or upgrade the items they find.

Steam Demo:
Lootun offers a Steam Demo allowing you to play the game up to level 50. Demo saves and achievements will automatically transfer to the full version.

Core Features:
Lootun offers 4 core classes to choose from each with a custom set of skills and 3 Ascendancy Classes to upgrade into.
There are a total of 28 default skills and 28 cooldown skills available. Each skill has 8 different passives to choose from allowing for a wide variety of builds. In addition each Class and Ascendancy Class offers a total of 25 passives to choose from.

500+ Equipment Items to collect, providing a high level of customization when equipping your adventurers.
100+ Monsters and 50+ Bosses to fight each with their own selection of abilities and item drops.
14 Flasks to craft and upgrade allowing you to augment your combat experience depending on your needs.
50+ Powerful Endgame Enchants allowing you to take your builds to the next level.
145 Unique Achievements to complete with over 600 total ranks.
80+ Divine Items offering powerful Combat bonuses.
18 unlockable Character Slots

Upgrades:
As you progress through Lootun you will be able to use your acquired materials to purchase powerful, gameplay altering upgrades including the ability to collect more, better quality, equipment, unlock crafting, professions, a flask system and powerful socketable gems.

Lootun provides a number of powerful automation features such as auto salvage, automatic ability casting and automatically restarting combat upon defeat. Such automation features allow you to have multiple teams of adventurers active at once.

Endgame Challenges
Test the strength of your teams against challenging 6 Character Raids for powerful endgame rewards.

In-game Glossary:
Lootun provides a comprehensive in-game glossary which attempts to provide all the information you may need while playing. This glossary includes a breakdown of game mechanics and descriptions of every attribute.

As you progress through the game you will unlock additional information about each monster you encounter, the abilities they use and the items they drop. In addition information on every item, flask and enchant is available to unlock including drop locations and bonus attributes.

data.short_description: Lootun is a Semi-Idle RPG with a strong focus on Character/Skill Progression, Item Hunting, and Inventory Management. Assemble a team of adventurers and send them off to clear missions while you Craft, Upgrade and Enchant the Loot!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10+
  • Processor: Dual-Core 1.8 GHZ or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10+
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.4 GHZ or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
